pkgmetadata.longdescription: Accessing the Flipside Crypto ShroomDK API // Programmatic access to Flipside Crypto data via the Compass RPC API: https://api- docs.flipsidecrypto.xyz/. As simple as auto_paginate_query() but with core functions as needed for troubleshooting. Note, 0.1.1 support deprecated 2023-05-31.
